metadata.title: CVE-2015-4901 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 8u60 allows remote attackers toaffect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectorsrelated to JavaFX.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4901` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenjfx-java - 8u91-b14-1
libopenjfx-jni - 8u91-b14-1
openjfx - 8u91-b14-1
openjfx-source - 8u91-b14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjfx package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8u91-b14-1').
